# objectremover

objectremover is an RStudio addin to assist with clearing objects from the Global environment.

## Installation

You can install the development version of objectremover from Github with:

```{r install, eval = FALSE} 
devtools::install_github("alan-y/objectremover")
```

## Example

This is an RStudio add in that should be used interactively.
